resources.string: There were times in which i was thinking deeply or thinking about many things
I found myself sometimes failing to concentrate
I lost my temper or got annoyed over trivial matters
I had nightmares or bad dreams
I sometimes saw or heard things which others could not see or hear
I was frightened by trivial things
I sometimes failed to sleep or lost sleep
There were moments when i felt life was so tough that i cried or wanted to cry
At times I felt like commiting suicide
I was generally unhappy with things that i would be doing each day
I felt I had problems in deciding what to do
kukekwaba lesikhati lapho owake wacabanga kakhulu kumbe ukucabanga izinto ezinengi.
wake wazibona kwesinye isikhathi ungakwanisi ukufaka inqondo zakho ndawo inye.
kulesikhathi lapho owake wazonda kakhulu kumbe wancaphuka ngezinto ezincane.
kulesikhati lapho owake wabona okwakungabonwa ngabanye kumbe ukuzwa izinto ezazingazwakali ngabanye.
eliphelileyo kulesikhathi lapho owake wethuswa yizinto ezincane.
kulesikhathi owawusehluleka ukulala kumbe ukuphelelwa yibuthongo.
kulezikhathi lapho owake wezwa kungani impilo inzima kakhulu ukokuthi wacina ukhala kumbe ufuna ukukhala.
wake wezwa ungathakazeleli ukwenza izinto owawuzenza nsukuzonke.
wawusizwa kukomela uswela ukuthi uqalisele ngaphi
Pane pandaimboona ndichifungisisa kana kufunga zvakawanda
Pane pandaimbotadza kuisa pfungwa dzangu pamwechete
Pane pandaimboshatirwa kana kuita hasha zvenhando
Pane pandaimborota hope dzinotyisa kana dzisina kunaka
Pane pandaimboona kana kunzwa zvinhu zvaisaonekwa kana kunzwika nevamwe
Pane pandaimbotadza kurara kana kushaya hope
Pane pandaimbonza kuomerwa neupenyu zvekuti ndaimbochema kana kunzwa kuda kuchema
Ndainzwa kusafara nezvinhu zvandaiita zuva nezuva
Basa rangu rainge rava kusarira kumashure
Ndainzwa zvichindiomera kuti ndizive kuti ndoita zvipi
